verbs.description: petaluma [ARG0: police] [V: use] [ARG1: taser] [ARG2: to arrest man for vandalism resisting arrest] petaluma police used a taser on a 27-year - old man who was resisting arrest then took him into custody saturday night salomon huitron of petaluma was arrested on a felony warrant for vandalism to a neighbor car as well as resisting officers he was booked into sonoma county jail police responded to the 100 block of rocca drive for calls about a dispute between neighbors huitron was known to officers for ongoing harassment of a neighbor including vandalism of his car since mid - october police said after the vandalism incident they obtained a warrant when officers arrived police said huitron retreated into his house as he had in past encounters sonoma county jail salomon huitron petaluma california resisting arrest arrest petaluma vandalism harassment
